option.name: PROXY_EXCEPTIONS
option.value: *.apache.org, *.github.com, *.github.io, *.githubusercontent.com, *.gitlab.com, *.google.com, *.gradle.org, *.jetbrains.space, *.maven.org, cache-redirector.jetbrains.com, cloudconfig.jetbrains.com, download-cdn.jetbrains.com, download.jetbrains.com, downloads.marketplace.jetbrains.com, ea-report.jetbrains.com, github.com, gitlab.com, google.com, gradle.org, jcenter.bintray.com, plugins.jetbrains.com, resources.jetbrains.com, www.jetbrains.com
